author: aconway
msg: QPID-3603: Broker option --ha-replicate-default to specify default replication.
Takes values 'all', 'configuration', 'all'. This is the replication level to use
if a queue or exchange is created without an explicit 'qpid.replicate' argument.

author: larsh
msg: HBASE-5682 Allow HConnectionImplementation to recover from ZK connection loss

author: dweiss
msg: Ignore nested test suites if run from IDEs.
